sentences.en: All rooms are linked to the main switchboard.
sentences.cn: 所有的房间都与主开关连接.

sentences.en: Ask the switchboard operator for an outside line.
Barbara will man the telephone switchboard till we get back.
sentences.cn: 我们回来前由巴巴拉管理电话总机.

sentences.en: Call the switchboard and ask for extension 410.
sentences.cn: 你先打电话到总机，然后要求转分机410。

sentences.en: From the minute it ended, the White House switchboard was clogged with congratulatory phone calls.
sentences.cn: 从它结束的那一分钟开始, 白宫的电话总机就由于祝贺的电话太多而应接不暇.

sentences.en: He asked to be connected to the central switchboard at London University.
sentences.cn: 他要求转接到伦敦大学的电话总机。

sentences.en: He asked to be connected to the central switchboard.
He instructed switchboard staff to divert all Laura's calls to him.
sentences.cn: 他让总机接线员将劳拉所有的电话都转给他。

sentences.en: Hundreds of callers jammed the switchboard trying to win the tickets (= there were too many calls for the switchboard to deal with ) .
sentences.cn: 几百个电话打进来想赢取门票，总机应接不暇。

sentences.en: If you want an outside line, you'll have to ask the switchboard.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要外线, 你得叫交换台给你转.

sentences.en: In this view, a manager is sometimes likened to a telephone switchboard.
sentences.cn: 根据这个观点, 有时候把管理者比拟为电话总机.

sentences.en: O : Tanaka General Enterprises, switchboard. Who [ m ] do you wish to speak to?
sentences.cn: 田中 通用公司总机. 请问您要找谁?

sentences.en: The girls on the switchboard are always having to put out calls for him.
sentences.cn: 总机接线员老得通过广播呼叫他接电话.

sentences.en: The switchboard is manned twenty - four hours a day.
sentences.cn: 电话总机是一天24小时由人操纵的.

sentences.en: The technicians are coming to fix the telephone switchboard.
sentences.cn: 技师们马上就来修理电话交换机.

sentences.en: This is switchboard, what can I do for you?
sentences.cn: 这里是电话总机, 我能为你做点什么 吗 ?

phrases.tran_cn: 电话交换台，电话交换机

trans.tran_en: a system used to connect telephone calls in an office building, hotel etc, or the people who operate the system
